title: Determination of Toxicity and Hypoglycemic Effect in Alloxan-induced Diabetic Mice ofManihot esculentaCrantz (Fam. Euphorbiaceae) Aqueous Crude Leaf Extract and its Fractions.
abstract: Manihot esculenta(Crantz) leaves have been used for the management of diabetes based on cited ethnopharmacological studies. However, scientific evidence to support its efficacy is lacking. The aim of the study was to assess the cytotoxicity of the aqueous leaf extract and fractions ofManihot esculentaand its potential hypoglycemic effect on male Swiss albino mice.
